Description:
The Perfect Starter!
Whether you're looking to enter the market and purchase your first home or wanting to invest; this beautifully maintained double storey dwelling is everything you're looking for within minutes from schools, public transport, local shops, lakes, walking/ cycling tracks. Offering 3 good size bedrooms (master with full ensuite and all with BIR's), separate study/ 4th bedroom, good size kitchen that overlooks spacious living and dining area with access to outdoor timber decking entertaining area, 3rd bathroom downstairs, separate laundry, double carport with remote control.
Fixtures and fittings including; high ceilings, balcony, ducting heating, reverse cycle cooling, double blinds, kitchen appliances, dishwasher and much more.
*Harcourts Roxburgh Park Coronavirus Update*
In light of recent events, Harcourts Roxburgh Park have taken the appropriate measures to minimise the risk of the coronavirus (COVID-19) outbreak to our staff, clients and customers. As news concerning the spread of coronavirus continues to unfold, we are no longer conducting open for inspections and kindly ask that you DO NOT attend inspections, if:
* You are feeling unwell
* Have been in contact with someone diagnosed with coronavirus
* Have been in contact with someone who has recently been overseas
* You are under strict self-isolation instructions
* You have tested positive to coronavirus yourself
If attending inspections, please ensure you practice Social Distancing (minimum 1.5 metres) at all times, keeping in mind:
* Our agents will restrict the number of people inspecting the property to one person at any time.
* You refrain from touching surfaces, door handles, cupboards, drawers, walls, etc. when inspecting the property.
We appreciate your co-operation and ask that you please respect the advice and recommendations of the agent when inspecting the property.

Description:
EASY LIVING WITH A BIG BACKYARD
Whether youre looking for that perfect first home, downsizing or adding to your property portfolio then this superbly presented home will impress.
The functional floor plan features 3 bedrooms, master to ensuite, built in robes to remaining rooms, central bathroom, intimate living area and impressive kitchen with loads of cupboard and bench space.
Secure single car garage, rear landscaped yard with an outdoor decking area and garden shed.
Situated only minutes from Willmott Park Primary, Craigieburn Central, Splash Aquatic and Leisure Centre and much more

Description:
Perfect First Home or Impressive Investment
In a popular & whisper quiet Aston neighbourhood close to Craigieburn Central, Schools & public transport, this freestanding home presents a ready-to-enjoy environment of easy-living style with its generous design, substantial outdoor entertaining space, long list of features & abundance of natural light throughout.
Presenting an inviting interior comprising 3 double bedrooms (master with walk-in robe & stylish ensuite), sparkling main bathroom & open-plan living/dining area spilling out to a colossal decked area and private back garden, perfect for kids to play in complete privacy.
Other highlights include, a well-appointed kitchen with stainless steel cooking appliances, ample cupboard & stone bench space, deep pantry & dishwasher, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, roller shutters throughout, plus remote-control double garage with internal entry.
Tick all the boxes on your must-have wish list with this modern delight that is sure to excite all home buyers & investors alike.

Description:
The PERFECT START - One the Whole Family will Enjoy !
Be quick to secure this beautiful quality home and be the envy of all your family & friends. Comprising of 4 spacious bedrooms, BIRs, master with luxurious ensuite & walk in robe.
Cook up a storm with your fully equipped designer kitchen with European 900mm S/S appliances, Caesar-Stone island bench & large walk-in pantry. Adjoining large dining & family room, spacious separate lounge / theatre and a spacious Alfresco. There is simply no finer way to entertain family and friends.
All the hard work has been done for you, the complete package! Your dream home awaits
Extras Include:
• Large 900mm European style stainless steel appliances
• Caesar-Stone tops to kitchen, bathroom and ensuite
• Study nook
• Carpet and timber look flooring throughout
• Alfresco
• Ducted heating
• Contemporary front landscaping and large veggie patch at the back
• Alarm and hi quality cameras
• Driveway, path and fencing
• Remote control double garage
• Security door and window screens
Please contact Sharad Kapoor for more information or to arrange an inspection on 0416 404 595
*** Inspection via Private Appointment ONLY ***
** SOCIAL DISTANCING REGULATIONS AND CONDITIONS APPLY! **
** Please be advised that in an effort to reduce the spread of Coronavirus (COVID-19), we ask that if you have recently returned from any overseas travel, are feeling unwell or developing flu like symptoms or have been in contact with someone who is ill please contact us prior to inspecting this property so that we can arrange an alternative inspection option for you.**

Description:
NEEDS TO BE SEEN TO BE APPRECIATED
Set in the highly sought-after location in Roxburgh Park on a great allotment of approx. 490m2, this fantastic home is sure to appeal to even the most fastidious of buyers. Featuring a functional layout this wonderful home comprises of 4 spacious bedrooms with BIR's, master with walk in robe, full ensuite, modern kitchen boasting 900mm stainless steel appliances and Dishwasher, 2 generous living zones and meals area. Whist other features to the home include double garage, ducted heating, 2 Split systems, hardwood floorboard and Externally outdoor entertainment is perfect for those lazy days and perfect summer nights well maintained gardens just to name a few. short stroll away from Roxburgh Rise Primary School, With nothing more to do than move in.
A home with this much class and opportunity won't last long
INSPECTIONS BY APPOINTMENT ONLY

Description:
When quality matters!!!
Immaculate park views are one of many reasons to call this ultra-stylish and desirably low maintenance property "home". This surprisingly private and peaceful residence offers a life of unquestionable quality and convenience and will sure to impress upon entry.
Set over two floors and situated in the sought-after pocket of Craigieburn's Aston estate and surrounded by an abundance of local amenities such as Craigieburn Central Shopping Centre, schools, childcare facilities, medical centres, restaurants, Splash Aqua Park and Leisure Centre, Hume Library, park-lands and transport are all added bonuses in capitalizing this opportunity.
The ground floor comprises of a study, powder room, laundry with plenty of cupboard space and 60mm stone bench-top with internal access to the double lock-up garage, modern high quality kitchen with 900 mm appliances, dishwasher, 60 mm waterfall featured stone bench-tops, and separate living and dining areas.
The second floor boasts 3 generously sized bedrooms, master suite complete with walk in robe and full en-suite with a his and hers basin with stone bench-top and freestanding bathtub, built in robes to the remaining sleeping quarters all of which feature timber flooring and a large scale central family bathroom with stone bench top and tiles to ceiling and a good size retreat area for the family to enjoy.
Luxury features include ducted heating, cooling, blinds, low maintenance yards, alarm system, down-lights and quality and modern lighting fixtures throughout, high ceilings and much more.
*Harcourts Roxburgh Park Coronavirus Update*
In light of recent events, Harcourts Roxburgh Park have taken the appropriate measures to minimise the risk of the coronavirus (COVID-19) outbreak to our staff, clients and customers. As news concerning the spread of coronavirus continues to unfold, we are no longer conducting open for inspections and kindly ask that you DO NOT attend inspections, if:
* You are feeling unwell
* Have been in contact with someone diagnosed with coronavirus
* Have been in contact with someone who has recently been overseas
* You are under strict self-isolation instructions
* You have tested positive to coronavirus yourself
If attending inspections, please ensure you practice Social Distancing (minimum 1.5 metres) at all times, keeping in mind:
* Our agents will restrict the number of people inspecting the property to one person at any time.
* You refrain from touching surfaces, door handles, cupboards, drawers, walls, etc. when inspecting the property.
We appreciate your co-operation and ask that you please respect the advice and recommendations of the agent when inspecting the property.

Description:
Nothing Less Than A Display !!
A fantastic opportunity to buy this magnificent 4 Bedroom house in Craigieburn. Set on a generous 392 sqm allotment, the floorplan is skillfully designed to maximise utility.
With 4 generous sized bedrooms (master with an ensuite and WIR and remaining 3 bedrooms with Built In Robes), multiple living areas and quality fittings and fixtures throughout, this house will tick most of your boxes. When it comes to space it caters to all large and growing families with an open plan living area and a great sized kitchen with quality cabinetry and 900mm stainless-steel appliances, oven and cooktop in alfresco as well.
An abundance of light, luxury and living space defines this exceptional family home situated in a privileged position. This home is designed to accommodate both growing family and first home buyers.
Within close proximity to schools, shopping centers, child care centers, public transport, parklands and many more.
The premium inclusions are: Laminate flooring, Alfresco, 2.7m ceilings with square set finishes, LED Downlights, Refrigerated system heating and cooling, 40mm stone bench tops throughout, 900 stainless steel appliances, Blinds, Exposed aggregate driveway, Niches, concrete around the house, Raised façade & many more.
Inspection would Definitely Impress!!

Perfect Start or Perfect Investment
Biggin & Scott North welcomes you to this Brand new modern built townhouse with an enviable location of well-established Craigieburn Highlands estate well suited for young professional families and investors alike. This exceptional natural light filled 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom and double garage property is a fantastic example of generous family living that can cater for all the space you need.

Description:
Comfort and Convenience in Craigieburn !!
Presenting an exciting opportunity for young families, first home buyers and investors to enter the growing suburb of Craigieburn, this exceptional single level home offers an easy-care lifestyle close to amenities, expansive parklands and everything Craigieburn has to offer.
This well-appointed home offers: - Four generously sized bedrooms - Central tiled bathroom with shower - Private ensuite adjoining the light-filled master bedroom - Sizeable open plan living/kitchen/dining enjoying an abundance of natural light and easy access to the rear yard - Quality kitchen with quality appliances and plenty of storage space - Single car garage with internal access - Two split system heating and cooling providing comfort in every season in addition to central heating system. Low maintenance landscaped back and front home so you can focus on the more important aspects of life. Spacious rear yard, perfect for those with young children and pets - The location is ideal with Parklands hosting a plethora of playgrounds and walking trails, along with Schools Highlands Shopping Centre and Craigieburn Central just a short distance away. This location has everything young families need to grow and thrive. Please Call before it's SOLD

Description:
Ultimate Lifestyle in a Premier Location
Flanked by beautiful nature surrounds & tucked away in a quiet cul-de-sac, this two-storey ex-display family showpiece presents an aspirational lifestyle of quality & versatility with its first-class inclusions, terrific indoor/outdoor entertaining spaces & exclusive Display Village Location.
The home's impressive 42sq interior showcases 4 genuinely large bedrooms (a colossal master with balcony, smartly configured robes & private double-vanity ensuite with spa bath), down-stairs home office, main family bathroom & guest powder room (3rd WC).
Multiple living zones include a large formal lounge with cosy gas log fireplace, upstairs rumpus/retreat, vast open-plan meals & family/living area, a connoisseurs kitchen with ample cupboard & bench space, large walk-in pantry & brilliant appliances.
Add to this a fully equipped & climatized Hoyt's like cinema room, providing the very best in sound and picture quality (all-inclusive 104-inch screen, Mitsubishi 1080p projector, 7.1 Surround sound Yamaha Speakers, Blue-Ray, Subwoofer & 5 Reclining Theatre chairs (3 Automated) & loads of extras that need to be seen to be believed!) All thanks to the Big Picture People'.
Big bifold doors reveal an unbelievable semi-enclosed Grand Alfresco where hosting large-scale family gatherings will be nothing short of memorable. Vast decking area, water feature, ceiling fan & low maintenance surrounds are the hallmarks of this private paradise. This is truly sublime.
Expect all the creature comforts & upgrades from this sensational Metricon display home. Highlights include ducted heating & evaporative cooling, (powerful split system to theatre room), alarm system, CCTV, ducted vacuum, high ceilings, solid timber doors, roomy & excellent storage spaces throughout plus a double automated garage.
In a uniquely quiet & convenient tree-lined pocket, it's walking distance to the open spaces of Highlands Lake & Anzac Park, Craigieburn Central Shopping Centre, close to local schools & childcare facilities, endless walking/cycling trails, public transport & major arterial roads.

Description:
Family Expanse with Location Perfection!
Exclusively positioned in a leafy Creekwood cul-de-sac with Malcolm Creek trails & parkland
at the end of the street, this spacious home provides a fabulous family lifestyle opportunity with its flexible floorplan, quality features throughout & expansive garden surrounds.
An idyllic environment for growing families, the home's expansive interior comprises an
enormous master bedroom with large walk-in robe & private ensuite, together with 3 further bedrooms (all with built-in robes), main central bathroom & guest powder room (third WC).
Along with a dedicated study/home office, the home also includes a spacious front lounge,
rumpus/retreat (upstairs) & light-filled open living & dining areas complemented by a well-
appointed kitchen with dishwasher & stainless steel cooking appliances.
Ducted heating, evaporative cooling & split-system air conditioning all add to the appeal along with a wood heater (living area), CCTV & video intercom, large laundry & under-stair
storeroom, plus a wide backyard with handy storage shed, internally-accessed double garage
& additional triple garage/workshop to the rear - perfect for tradies!
Exceptional family versatility, it's also close to public transport (buses on Creekwood Drive), popular primary & secondary schools, Craigieburn Central Shopping Centre, as well as easy access to the Hume Freeway.

Description:
Resort Style Living at you Doorstep
Phone Code for this property is: 8927
(enter code After Hearing Message)
Titled 630 m2 block located within the exclusive Mandalay Golf course estate with quiet tranquil settings and mountain views to the rear.
Walking distance to clubhouse offering resort style living by offering heated pool, tennis courts, gymnasium, cafe and pro shop available to owners through owners corporation.
Only 40 min on the freeway to Melbourne CBD and 10 min drive to Craigieburn and conveniently located for access to the new city of the North.
Mandalay offers a Community Centre with Childcare facilities, Kindergarten and Maternal Healthcare Centre and plans are in place for proposed school.
Be part of this growing Community in Mandalay

Description:
Brand New Quality Home!
Located in the popular Trijena estate with close proximity to all future amenities. This Brand-New family home offers space, style & luxury for the for the family to enjoy.
Featuring 4 good sized bedrooms (master with full en-suite and WIR). Leading through to an open plan living including good size kitchen with Caesar stone bench tops & walk in pantry that overlooks family living and meals opens out to the low maintenance courtyard. Central bathroom with bathtub, double remote garage with internal access!
Fixtures & fittings including: ducted heating, refrigerated cooling, alarm system, dishwasher, blinds throughout, s/steel appliances and much more.
*Harcourts Roxburgh Park Coronavirus Update*
In light of recent events, Harcourts Roxburgh Park have taken the appropriate measures to minimise the risk of the coronavirus (COVID-19) outbreak to our staff, clients and customers. As news concerning the spread of coronavirus continues to unfold, we are no longer conducting open for inspections and kindly ask that you DO NOT attend inspections, if:
* You are feeling unwell
* Have been in contact with someone diagnosed with coronavirus
* Have been in contact with someone who has recently been overseas
* You are under strict self-isolation instructions
* You have tested positive to coronavirus yourself
If attending inspections, please ensure you practice Social Distancing (minimum 1.5 metres) at all times, keeping in mind:
* Our agents will restrict the number of people inspecting the property to one person at any time.
* You refrain from touching surfaces, door handles, cupboards, drawers, walls, etc. when inspecting the property.
We appreciate your co-operation and ask that you please respect the advice and recommendations of the agent when inspecting the property.

Description:
Better Living at AMAZING Value!
The magnificent Porter Davis design "Hampshire" doesn't compromise on style or functionality.
Instead, it offers an exceptional home that offers all you need for the growing family. There are four bedrooms, two bathrooms as well as plenty of living space including a large rumpus at the rear of the house, joining to the kitchen, here's the dining and family area for comfortable ease and use.
- Modern kitchen with large walk-in pantry
- 20mm Stone Benchtop, 900mm S/S Cooktop and range-hood
- Open plan living area with separate rumpus room
- Spacious master bedroom with his & her walk-in robes
- Luxury turn-key inclusions including ducted heating and security alarm
- Front landscaping and driveway included
- Double garage with internal access
- Located in Botanical - Mickleham's newest master-planned community
- Land size: 420m2
- House size: 24.70sq approx
- MOVE-IN READY!
Purchase a brand new Porter Davis home Today, rest easy knowing all you have to do is move.
Plus, first home buyer, are eligible for the $10,000 first home buyer grant and NO STAMP DUTY under the value of 600k.
Please note we have more properties available across Mickleham, Craigieburn & Kalkallo, simply send an email inquiry for a full list and to arrange an inspection.
Porter Davis, industry-leading after-sales service, rest easy knowing their New Home Care Team are just a phone call away.
